name: Fists Up
description:
You favor the raw simplicity of fists and whateverâ€™s within reach.

When you make unarmed attacks or strike with an improvised weapon, your damage die is a d6. Also, you may make one attack per free hand each turn.

However, you are awkward with implements of combat: your attacks made with purpose-made weapons are ill-favored.

Describe how your stripped-down style delivers a brutal blow.
